Package RautSoft.math.lp

This package contains implementation of adoptation of Simplex algorithm from Numerical Recipe and LpSolve package.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
constant  
 

Class Summary
lprec  
LpSolve LpSolve Solves Linear Programming Problems.
Simplex Solves LP problem using Simplex algorithm.
solve  
 

Package RautSoft.math.lp Description

This package contains implementation of adoptation of Simplex algorithm from Numerical Recipe and LpSolve package. There are several classes in the original package of LpSolve. The original classes are somewhat modified for this application and a new class LpSolve is added by Lakshmi K. Raut.

Usage Examples:

Example 1:

        import rautsoft.math.lpsolve.*;
        import static rautsoft.math.lpsolve.solve.*;
        import static rautsoft.math.lpsolve.LpSolve.*;


        public class LpSolveEX  {
    
    
    
        public static void main(String args[]) {
        double [][] A = {{2,1},{1,2},{1,1},{1.5,2.5}};
        double [] obj= {1.5, 2.5};
        double [] rhs ={  10.0, 6.5, 5, 12};
        System.out.println("The Solution of the first problem");
        LpSolve lp = new LpSolve();
        lp.LpMaxStandard(A, rhs,obj);
        System.out.println("LP output from super"+lp);
        System.out.println("The optimal Primal solution vector");
        double [] opt=lp.getOptimalPrimalSolution();
        for (int i=0;i<opt.length;i++)System.out.println(opt[i]);
        System.out.println("The optimal Dual solution vector");
        double [] optdual=lp.getOptimalDualSolution();
        for (int i=0;i<optdual.length;i++)System.out.println(optdual[i]);
        System.out.println("Optimal value of the obj function:" +lp.getOptimizedObjective());

Output of the above program

        The Solution of the first problem
        The optimal primal solution 
        Value of objective function: 9.0
        Var [1]  3.5
        Var [2]  1.5

        Dual values:
        Row [1]  0.0
        Row [2]  1.0
        Row [3]  0.5
        Row [4]  0.0
        LP output from super
        RautSoft Economics and Business Numerics:  Sunday, May 1, 2005 1:41:18 AM PDT

        exitCode = 0: optimal solution found
        The optimal Primal solution vector
        3.5
        1.5
        The optimal Dual solution vector
        0.0
        1.0
        0.5
        0.0
        Optimal value of the obj function:9.0
